Motion: This House Prefers secondary schools adopting a classical education model rather than a progressive education model.
Motion_Chinese: 本院更倾向于中学采用古典主义教育模式而非进步主义教育模式。

Motion: This House Opposes confidence culture.
Motion_Chinese: 本院反对“自信文化”。

Motion: This House Believes that US involvement in Panama has benefitted Panama.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，美国在巴拿马的介入使巴拿马受益。

Motion: This House Believes that feminists in Western Liberal Democracies should adopt reconciliatory rather than confrontational approaches in their advocacy.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，在西方自由民主国家，女权主义者在倡导时应采取和解的方式，而非对抗的方式。

Motion: This House Believes that the student organisers of the July Revolution should not transition into formal political roles (e.g., run for elected office, form their own political party).
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，“七月革命”的学生组织者不应转型为正式的政治角色（例如：竞选公职、组建政党）。

Motion: This House Supports the rise of specialised private equity firms and funds that focus on specific sectors or geographies.
Motion_Chinese: 本院支持专注于特定领域或特定地区的专业化私募股权公司和基金的兴起。

Motion: This House Prefers the citizen welfare standard to the consumer welfare standard.
Motion_Chinese: 本院更倾向于“公民福利标准”而非“消费者福利标准”。

Motion: This House Supports the use of La Mano Dura policies in areas with high crime rates in Latin America.
Motion_Chinese: 本院支持在拉丁美洲高犯罪率地区推行强硬治安/铁腕政策（La Mano Dura）。

Motion: This House Believes that India should prioritise policies that aim to significantly reduce economic inequality rather than prioritise policies that aim to rapidly drive economic growth.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，印度应优先推行旨在大幅减少经济不平等的政策，而非优先推行旨在快速推动经济增长的政策。

Motion: This House Supports the widespread adoption of the Sankofa philosophy in West Africa.
Motion_Chinese: 本院支持在西非广泛推广Sankofa 哲学（阿坎语，意为“回首取经”）

Motion: This House Opposes the prominence of the trauma plot in media and art.
Motion_Chinese: 本院反对“创伤叙事”在媒体与艺术中的突出地位。

Motion: This House Believes that it is in the interest of the USA to significantly reduce the size and power of federal government agencies.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，美国有利益上的需要显著削减联邦政府机构的规模与权力。

Motion: This House Would militarily intervene in Sudan.
Motion_Chinese: 本院将对苏丹进行军事干预。

Motion: This House Supports the shift away from the traditional left-right spectrum in the politics of major democracies.
Motion_Chinese: 本院支持主要民主国家的政治脱离传统的左右翼光谱划分。

Motion: This House Opposes the increased shift to subscription based business models.
Motion_Chinese: 本院反对商业模式日益转向订阅制。

Motion: This House, as the Holy See, would adopt the "two-speed Church" policy.
Motion_Chinese: 本院，作为圣座，将采纳“双速教会”政策。

Motion: This House Believes That Trumpism is in the long-term interest of the Republican Party.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，“特朗普主义”符合共和党的长期利益。

Motion: This House believes that education systems should over-inflate children’s academic self-perception (e.g. providing overwhelmingly positive feedback, avoiding fail grades, etc.).
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，教育体系应当刻意夸大儿童/学生的学业自我认知（例如：给予极度正面的反馈、避免不及格分数等）。

Motion: This House prefers the integrated model to the specialty model.
Motion_Chinese: 本院更倾向于综合（通科）模式而非专科模式。

Motion: This House believes that opposition parties in illiberal democracies should strongly pivot towards empowering women as the primary focus of their campaign.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，在非自由民主国家，反对党应当将赋权于女性作为竞选的主要焦点。

Motion: This House supports the remilitarisation of Japan.
Motion_Chinese: 本院支持日本再军事化。

Motion: This House prefers reactive to proactive EMS enforcement.
Motion_Chinese: 本院更倾向于反应式（事后/应对型）而非主动式（事前/预防型）的应急医疗服务（EMS）监管/执法。

Motion: This House supports Centrist Compacts.
Motion_Chinese: 本院支持“中间派协定”（Centrist Compacts）。

Motion: THBT central banks should “lean against the wind”.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，各国央行应当采取“逆风操作”（逆周期调节，lean against the wind）

Motion: This House supports a norm against self-pity.
Motion_Chinese: 本院支持反对自怜的社会规范。

Motion: This House would remove restrictions on interstate farm commerce in India.
Motion_Chinese: 本院将取消印度对州际农产品贸易的限制。

Motion: This House opposes the stigma against laziness
Motion_Chinese: 本院反对对“懒惰”的污名化。

Motion: This House supports implementing a Pact of Forgetting in post-conflict states.
Motion_Chinese: 本院支持在后冲突国家推行“遗忘协定”（Pact of Forgetting）。

Motion: This House would ban vulture funds from suing countries whose debt they have purchased.
Motion_Chinese: 本院将禁止秃鹫基金（vulture funds）起诉其所购债务所属的国家。

Motion: This House opposes the norm to prefer the natural to the artificial.
Motion_Chinese: 本院反对偏好“天然”甚于“人工”的社会规范。

Motion: This House believes that religious leaders should primarily focus on individual circumstances rather than community-based reasons when addressing acts of religious extremism.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，在应对宗教极端行为时，宗教领袖应当主要关注个体处境，而非以社群为基础的解释/论述。

Motion: This House would ban defensive measures against hostile take overs.
Motion_Chinese: 本院将禁止针对恶意收购的防御性措施。

Motion: This House welcomes the end of work.
Motion_Chinese: 本院欢迎“工作的终结”。

Motion: This House prefers a diverse number of highly competitive banks to a small number of banks.
Motion_Chinese: 本院更倾向于拥有大量高度竞争的银行，而非少数几家银行。

Motion: This House believes that post-revolutionary states should deemphasise the role of elite groups in favour of portraying revolution as primarily led by the lower classes.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，后革命国家应弱化精英群体的作用，转而强调革命主要由底层阶级所领导。

Motion: THBT (This House Believes That) it's in the interest of the team for the player to be excluded from the World Cup finals squad.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，为了球队的利益，应将该球员排除在世界杯决赛圈名单之外。

Motion: THP (This House Prefers) the quality of art being viewed as predominantly subjective as opposed to predominantly objective.
Motion_Chinese: 本院更倾向于将艺术的价值视为主要是主观的，而非主要是客观的。

Motion: THBT (This House Believes That) The Pacific Alliance should introduce a common currency.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，太平洋联盟应当引入共同货币。

Motion: THBT (This House Believes That) governments, when determining housing policy, should heavily prioritise supporting renters over home owners.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，各国政府在制定住房政策时，应当大力优先支持租房者而非房屋所有者。

Motion: THS (This House Supports) the increasing prominence of data journalism at the expense of qualitative journalism.
Motion_Chinese: 本院支持数据新闻的日益突出，即便以牺牲定性新闻为代价。

Motion: In developing countries with a history of ethnic, racial and/or religious tensions, THP (This House Prefers) a change of power from dominant political parties.
Motion_Chinese: 在有民族、种族和/或宗教紧张历史的发展中国家，本院更倾向于执政权从主导性政党手中转移。

Motion: THBT (This House Believes That) it is in the interests of Taiwan to pursue friendlier ties with China (e.g. economic, political and cultural ties).
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，台湾追求与中国建立更友好的关系（例如经济、政治与文化联系）符合其利益。

Motion: TH (This House), as an average individual in the world today, would prefer to be immortal.
Motion_Chinese: 本院，作为当今世界的普通个体，将更愿意选择永生。

Motion: THBT (This House Believes That) the internationalisation of intellectual property law brings more harm than good.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，知识产权法的国际化弊大于利。

Motion: THW (This House Would) allow democratic governments to overturn supreme court/constitutional court decisions with a simple majority in the legislature.
Motion_Chinese: 本院将允许民主国家的立法机关以简单多数票推翻最高法院/宪法法院的裁决。

Motion: THP (This House Prefers) a focus on societal factors (e.g. socioeconomic factors) as opposed to individual factors (e.g. personal history) when addressing the causes and consequences of mental health issues.
Motion_Chinese: 本院更倾向于在探讨心理健康问题的成因与后果时，侧重社会因素（如社会经济因素），而非个人因素（如个人经历）。

Motion: THBT (This House Believes That) the IMF removing all conditions on these loans, except for explicit anti corruption provisions, is preferable to the recent conditions to developing countries.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，国际货币基金组织（IMF）在贷款中除明确的反腐条款外取消所有其他附加条件，优于近年对发展中国家的现行贷款条件。

Motion: THR (This House Regrets) the dominance of left/liberal views at universities.
Motion_Chinese: 本院对自由派/左翼观点在大学中的主导地位表示遗憾。

Motion: THP (This House Prefers) a world where all individuals have a strong belief in Ubuntu.
Motion_Chinese: 本院更倾向于一个人人都坚信“乌班图（Ubuntu）”理念的世界（注：强调“我因我们而在”的群体互依）。

Motion: THBT (This House Believes That) education systems in Africa should emphasise pan-African history and identities rather than national ones.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，非洲的教育体系应当强调泛非历史与身份认同，而非国家历史与身份。

Motion: When they are not part of that religion, THBT (This House Believes That) feminists should refrain from critiquing widespread religious practices that have different rules based on gender (e.g. wearing of veils, separate prayer spaces, women on their period being forbidden from fasting, Iddah (waiting) period after divorce/death of a husband, etc.)
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，当女权主义者并非该宗教的信徒时，应避免批评那些基于性别差异而制定的普遍宗教实践（例如：佩戴面纱、分开祈祷、月经期女性被禁止斋戒、离婚/丧夫后的“尔待”（Iddah）期等）。

Motion: THBT (This House Believes That) religious organisations should syncretise over remaining independent.
Motion_Chinese: 本院认为，宗教组织应当趋向融合，而非保持独立。
